translations: n.[脊椎]有袋类；有袋目的哺乳动物（marsupial 的复数）

phrs.translation: 有袋类, 有袋目, 有袋类动物

sentences.sentence: Some marsupials can care for three newborns in their pouch at the same time.
sentences.translation: 有些有袋目动物可以同时在育儿袋中抚育三个刚出生的婴儿。

sentences.sentence: Marsupials just optioned for a different reproductive strategy.
sentences.translation: 罗哲西说，“有袋类动物只是选择了一条不同的生殖策略。”

sentences.sentence: DNA evidence has suggested the last common ancestor to eutherians and marsupials lived around 160 million years ago.
sentences.translation: DNA证据显示，真兽类和有袋类最后的共同祖先生活在1.6亿年前左右。
